Class ND4JBaseTensorProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.tensors.backends.ND4JBaseTensorProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
TensorProvider, BackendProvider, ComputeBackend
Direct Known Subclasses:
ND4JCUDATensorProvider, ND4JNativeTensorProvider
public abstract class ND4JBaseTensorProvider extends Object implements TensorProvider
Abstract Base for ND4J-backed Tensor Providers.

Encapsulates common logic for ND4J (Native or CUDA).

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
